You see Cassandra head over towards a secluded area of the beach. Despite talking to a friend on the phone it seemed as though she had come alone. You think to yourself 'Loner's stick together huh' but surprisingly it seemed as though Cassandra heard your thoughts and said: "Don't compare me to you perv!".


Both of you were surprised at the revelation, so you decided to test it out more by thinking more thoughts. 'So, can you hear this?'

Cassandra simply responded with a nod, clearly as shocked by this as you were. In your thoughts, you ask Cassandra to take you off for a second and move you away. She at first got angry, but upon hearing your reasoning decided to test it out. She tossed you a little bit away and waited, but no telepathic communication came. It seemed as though you had to be in contact with Cassandra to talk to her. Cassandra put you back on as quickly as possible, still not knowing about your 360-degree view.

'So, let's talk then' you said (thought?) to her.

"Sure," She replied. "This gives us time to talk about later."

The two of you have a discussion that results in...

A: A Cooperative Relationship, you help her when she forgets things and she lets you be a little perv around her and her friends
B: An agreement to leave each other entirely after today (Although you probably will meet again)
C: She agrees that she'll give you to a friend to wear, but she wants nothing to do with you after today.
1521121.title: Lonors together.

15211211.content:
After a bit of thinking to each (An hour or so) other Cassandra eventually warmed up to you. She still thinks you're a pervert, sure but she considers you a friend now as well. She agreed that you would be very useful for those times she needs things like today or she really needs something but doesn't have the money for it like an expensive pair of heels.

She also agreed to loan you out to friends occasionally if they needed something temporarily but they wouldn't know it was actually a person. You had decided to keep the part about seeing 360 a secret as to not make her get angry and so you could possibly get some sneaky looks in when she tried to keep you from looking.

The end of the day came and after a long day of sitting on the beach, swimming, and using the washroom (Although she told you not to look and you complied, not only because it probably wouldn't be that interesting but also because you could accidentally leak something in your thoughts that would break your entire deal). Since Cassandra lived relatively close to the water park she was able to walk home. She had long since changed into her regular clothes and told you to transform into something to follow her home. You decided to just be modest and transform into a fly and sit on her head.

On the way to her house, you continued talking to each other, mostly about your lives and confirming the terms of transforming. One of which was to never transform into something of hers without her knowing. You had also discovered that unless you were intending to talk to her your thoughts wouldn't get through. With the first message, your brain had probably unconsciously targetted her as a recipient of the thoughts. You had told her this and that was the reason why she had implemented the ban on transforming into things without her knowledge.

One thing you had learned about her is that...

A: She had several younger siblings and only permitted you to transform into things for them that weren't sexual, so no underwear, soap, shirts, pants, or bra's for the girls and no underwear or soap or pants for the boys. Meaning your list was limited to shirts for the boys, socks, shoes, backpacks, pencils and anything else not sexual in nature.
B: She was an only child and allowed you transformation rights for anything involving her parents.
C: She had just moved into the dorms for her first year of college far away which was the reason no one could give her an extra pair of swimwear.
15211211.title: Symbiotic Relationship.

152112111.content:
One thing you had learned about her is that she had siblings. Not just siblings, 3 of them, all younger. When she told you this you asked her if you could transform for them and she replied "I'll give you permission, but only as things that aren't sexual, which means no underwear or bras, no shirts or pants for the girls and no pants for my little brother. Anything else I'm fine with."

You stood silent. You weren't expecting an answer but what did you have to lose? This was better then you could've hoped for. You had always wondered what it would be like to be a pencil of a pair of socks and Cassandra just straight up gave you permission to have fun with her minor siblings.


Of course, you didn't care to turn into underwear for a little boy but if it was a grown man it would be something you would consider. Transforming for someone who didn't know about you would be great, you just had to be careful not to reveal yourself by accidentally thinking to them. Eventually, you and Cassandra reached her house which was pretty big, all things considered. It appeared to have two floors and if the windows under the porch said anything, also a basement.

Cassandra walked in and you followed. As she walked in she closed the door behind her and took her shoes off at the door, dropping them in the shoe rack. You dropped yourself on her head and asked her what you should do and she said "I'm going to go take a shower, you can go meet my siblings, they all live upstairs, the door on the right. Remember what I said though, nothing sexual."

You respond with affirmation and she walks off to the basement where you assume her room is. Immediately you fly up to the second floor and fly into the room on the right where Cassandra said her siblings would be. You see...

A: A 5-year-old boy and two 7-year-old girls.
B: A 15-year-old boy and two 16-year-old girls
C: A 5-year-old boy, 10-year-old girl, and a 15-year-old girl.
152112111.title: Family Life.

15212.content:
You shake your head at the idea of revealing your powers. What if she turned hostile and somehow found a way to torture you like putting you in a washing machine. You turn back into a bird and fly upwards, scanning the ground with the enhanced eyesight given to you for being a bird. You fly down to the top of a food stand to assess your surroundings.

To the right of you is a lounging area with countless people lying down on blankets for fiddling with their phones.

Right below you is a bunch of people eating in case you want to experience being eaten for some reason.

To the left is the woman's change room. It should be easy enough to sneak in there and swap with someone's swimwear.
15212.title: Greener Pastures.

1522.content:
You did recall a new Zoo opening up not too far away. Normally you would have to drive your piece of crap car to get there or take the bus, but now you had other options. It wouldn’t take too long to fly over there as a bird, not to mention free, and explore the areas normal people could never go. According to your dream, the world would change to fit you. You assume that meant if you entered a lion’s den and became a lion, it would be like you were always there. Being able to hang out as an animal instead of the terrible people you normally see would be a great change of pace.

There's also the Sea World on the other side of town for more aquatic animals. You wished they were closer, but what can you do? You can't control where the city builds things. All you really knew about this place is they liked to have shows. The usual stuff like dolphins jumping through hoops.

Plus, you’re a huge pervert and could go ahead and try things society looked down on.
1522.title: Explore Your Wild Side

15221.content:
In an instant, your body transformed into a bird and you took off into the sky. The freedom was exhilarating as you flew virtually weightless on the wind. Everyone looked like ants from your point of view and all your troubles were left behind. You didn’t have to worry about traffic as you sored over the city, making your way to the zoo. In no time at all, the large gates and habitats came into view and you slowly descended, careful not to draw attention. Not like anyone would notice. Most people didn’t believe in magic.

The zoo was a lot bigger than you remembered. Exotic animals like lions, wolves, and bears were either in large cages or walled off in pits. Larger herbivores like elephants and zebras had large open aired homes. Hundreds of people were walking around of all ages. It was the weekend and it was only natural for families to come here. There were people of all ages, from babies and children to elderly couples watching the penguins. There were so many options available to you.

Maybe you want to enter the carnivore enclosures. You could transform into the same animal and people would just assume you’ve always been there. Or you could try the same with the herbivores. You could just hang out with the animals or maybe try some of the darker fetishes you normally only see on the internet. Kids could learn something from animal mating habits. Then there were the people themselves. You could transform into inanimate objects too and could have some fun with them.

What do you decide?
15221.title: The Zoo

152211.content:
It was time to live dangerously. Your life had been boring and sucked. Part of it was not taking risks. Like that time back in high school you didn’t ask your crush out and a couple months later someone else did. If you don’t take the initiative, nothing would happen. You circled lower and lower as you debated about which habitat to invade first. The plan was to land and quickly transform in a shadow to prevent anyone from accidentally seeing you. You weren’t quite sure of all the specifics yet relating to your power. From you position there were three caged areas nearby.

The first was the lions. Their area resembled a savanna climate, with taller brown and yellow grass, a few scares trees for some shade, and some large rocks to climb on. The entire exhibit was in a deep pit so people could look down and watch them. You only saw female lionesses but there was a cave area that might hold a male. Animals needed privacy too.

The second exhibit was for wolves. There was more trees and greener grass. Their habitat resembled more of a forest floor with a lot more bushes. This one was caged off with heavy metal fences. There were plenty of clearings for people to see the animals. A couple grey wolves were mulling around.

The third one contained several large brown bears. They were in a cage consisting of thick glass to prevent anything from slipping through bars. A pool existed on one side of the caged area for them to swim and cool off. The rest was a forestry area with copious amounts of shade. Plenty of rocks to climb on too.

There were many other cages, but you decided to start at…
152211.title: Enter a Carnivore Habitat

15223.content: How about the community pool? There would be a lot fewer people than a water park which means a lot more bonding time with a single person.
15223.title: Community Pool.

152232.content: How about just taking a stroll through the city to see if anyone is complaining about needed something badly?
152232.title: Walking through the city.

1522321.content:
You decide to just take a stroll through the city to find opportunities as they come. Sure, you could just go to the waterpark but that's too easy. With that thought, you put on your casual clothes and leave your house, making sure to turn off your lights behind you. With a hop and a skip, you go to the elevator of your apartment and go down to the ground floor. Your arms jittered in excitement at the thought of transforming for someone.

Upon leaving your apartment you're hit with the glare of the sun and the heatwave associated with summer. This weather would probably leave a lot of people wanting either a sweat cloth or a change of clothes, both of which you would be happy to oblige. Of course, someone could have non-weather-related problems.

You simply just walk along your sidewalk, keeping your eyes and ears open for either someone complaining about something or someone who looks like they could use a friend.

All of a sudden you hear...

A: "God, I wish I hadn't lost my rag to wipe away all this sweat." You see a woman in a jogging outfit sweating buckets. You approach her and either pretend to just be a clean rag on a table or tell her about your powers.
B: A boy crying. Maybe he needs a transforming fairy friend, also known as you.
C: Others.
1522321.title: Helping people is great!

15223211.content:
You walk towards the sweating woman who is currently on a bench. You slide on the bench all smooth like beside her and start your spiel.

"So, I heard you lost a rag?" You asked, although you already knew the answer.

"If you're trying to hit on me, stop right there. I'm not in a good mood right now." She bit back, obviously grumpy because she had lost her rag.

"What if I told you I could solve your rag problem and many future problems for you?"

She looked at you, a confused look on her face. "Look buddy, unless you have the magical power to make objects appear, you cant help me with anything."

You smirked at how close she was to guessing your power, although she wasn't serious at all. "Something like that, " You say, a mischievous undertone in your voice. "If you'd like to hear more, follow me for a bit."

The woman contemplated it for a bit, before standing upon with a grunt of exertion and sighed. "Nothing better to do I guess."

You lead her a short ways away to somewhere without cameras and away from people. It was behind a building nearby, nowhere too sketchy where she'd back out. You take a deep breath and start explaining exactly what you could do. Her face grew more and more confused, probably starting to think that she had met a crazy person who thought he could transform.

"So, say I believe all this "transformation" shit. Why would you want to be a rag for a sweaty and smelly person?"

"Well, It's simple. I like the bad smell of a woman."

She looked at you in shock for a moment, before bursting out in laughter. "I expected a lot of answers but that, that's amazing." She says in between laughs.

Her laughing calmed down, allowing you to speak with her since she had calmed down. "So, let's address the elephant in the room, shall we? You probably don't believe I can transform, do you?"

"Well, of course, I don't. It's absurd."

"What if I transformed right in front of you?"

"In that case, I'd kinda be forced to accept it, no?"

With those as her final words, you transformed into a basketball in the air and bounced for a bit, before transforming back. "So, about my offer? Do you want me to be your personal transforming assistant?"

A: She responded in the positive, saying that always being able to have whatever she needed would be amazing.
B: She responded so-so, saying that she'd only take you as a rag temporarily until her run is over and then send you on your way.
C: She didn't respond at all, considering she fainted.
15223211.title: Friends with a Jogger.

choices: Follow her around as a fly.
Ask to turn into one of her socks.
152232111.content:
"Y'know, I actually would love to always have what I need. I'm actually a really forgetful person, so having you by my side would be amazing. So, what do I have to do for you in exchange for your abilities?"

"Well, it's simple, really, " You reply, "I just want you to use me, it's more than enough for me."

The woman simply laughed. "Deal, Partner. So, about that Rag?"

You simply say "On it!" before turning into a typical sweat rag. You appeared in the air but due to your aerodynamics, you simply waved back and forth in the air. As soon as the woman grabbed you, you mentally thought a question to her. It was a side benefit to your powers that you also had learned about from the dream. 'What's your name, by the way? Just think the answer back and I'll hear you'

'It's Becky. How about you?'

'I'm Y/N. Nice to meet you, Becky!'

'No, the pleasure is mine Y/N. So, can I get started wiping?'

'Go for it!'

With those words, the newly named Becky started using you to wipe away her sweat. The smell was amazing and being dragged around her body felt like you were licking up all her sweat. You could taste the sweat through the rags absorption and you were given an unrelenting supply of it. It was like an all you can eat buffet. Eventually, you had become too full of sweat for Becky to continue using you.

Becky started to ask if you could clean yourself, but before she even finished the question you said 'On it!' and cleaned yourself completely.

Becky laughed. 'You're really enthusiastic about this, aren't you, partner?'

'What did I tell you? I really like sweat.'

And with that, Silence ensued. Becky wiped herself down with you and you cleaned yourself whenever she needed you to. After a little bit of time, Becky finished wiping everywhere, even in her cleavage and armpits. You especially enjoyed the smelly armpits. Becky made the first action.

'Thank's for that so much partner, I would've hated to go home sweating buckets.

'The pleasure is all mine partner. Your sweat was amazing and your smell was as well.'

Becky thought to herself for a second, before relaying her question to you. 'So, what do you want to go home as?'
152232111.title: Positive Response.

choices: A house where she lives with her two children and is divorced.
A house where she lives alone.
1522321111.content:
'Well, the obvious answer is to stay as a rag, right? I mean, it's still a really hot day outside and you'd probably still need something to wipe off all that sweat.'' You thought to Becky, excited at the prospect of being there to lick up all her sweat as she traveled home in the intense summer heat.

'I suppose you are right. The heat is unbearable and I'd feel terrible sweating all the way home. Well, since you're already a rag lets go on our way!'

And with that, the two of you went on your way. Becky had put you around her neck, draping you over her shoulders as she walked. Every so often Becky pulled you off and used you to wipe the sweat off her body and you enjoyed every second of it. Eventually, Becky arrived at her place of residence which was...
1522321111.title: Stay as a Rag.

choices: "I'm sorry, I have to help more people, but I'll be back if you need help."
"I'll stay with you as long as you want! I promise!"
"I can stay a little longer, I guess."
15223212.content:
"Oi, this doesn't seem right.. I should do something." you mumble to your self as you see a young boy standing in front of a small store, crying for some reason.

You didn't need to think long and make take a few steps to hide in a small alley, before transforming in a robin.You decided to fly over and it doesn't take long before you get the hang of it. You make your way over to the boy and start circling above him and start tweeting in an attempt to cheer him up.
It works.. kinda.. the Boy stops his crying, and starts looking at you with tear filled eyes, still sobbing.
You go down, landing on the Child's shoulder.

"Hey buddy, what's wrong?" you ask the young lad.
"Yo-You can talk?"
"Yes, I'm.." you think about what to tell him.. you can't just say that you are 25 year old college dropout that works part time at a burger joint who just so happend to be granted the power to transform into objects and animals..
"I'm a magic friend. I come to those who need help. So, what's wrong?" you asked, cringing at the fact that you couldn't come up with something better.
"Oh, so so you're like a fairy?" the boy asked, still sobbing.
"Yes! Now tell me, what's the problem, why were you crying?"
"My- my mom, I lost my mom. We were walking through the city and then we got separated,"
You understood the problem and asked for a description of his mom.
When he told you how his mother looked like, you told him to hold his hand out and transformed into a balloon, that way you could see further but would still be at the young boy's side.

It took a while, but you soon spotted his mother and navigated him towards her. His mom hugged him, telling him to never leave her side again.
The young boy, who seemed to be called Aiden, didn't seem to listen though, he was just happy to see his mother again.

As they kept walking, Aiden pulled at the string that you were attached to, getting you down to eye level with him.

"Now that my mom is back, will you leave? Because I'm happy now. But if you want you can stay with me! We could have a lot of fun." he whispered to you.
15223212.title: Crying Child.

1522322.content: How about an airport? Lots of things to transform into and alot of different people to transform for. Also, you could travel to a foreign country easily.
1522322.title: The Airport?

15223222.title: How about the shoe store?

152232221.content:
You headed over to the local shoe store, it wasn't a big store like footlocker, but they sold affordable non-brand shoes, so it was still fairly popular. The store had a self-checkout system, where they scan the shoe barcode and it removes the anti-theft lock, making it only necessary to have one staff watch the exit and make sure no one leaves without paying.

You transformed into a fly and flew right over the staff's head, knowing that if you just walked in he'd wonder where you had gone. You had entered the store as soon as it opened, meaning the bustling crowds weren't an issue for your transforming adventures. You looked over the many aisles and decided to fly to the...

youve always adored children,and the thought of spending time with them made you smile...so you decide to go to the "Kidz R Us" that just so happens to be across the road from you...you decide yo turn into a flying bug soar out your window..the feeling of flying was exilerating as you feel the wind rush by you..you quickly wait for somone to pass through the sliding doors as you slip through and fly around..."this is amazing" you wonder now what the sensation of being an object might be as you land on an isle shelf you see that you are on a shelf for ______.

you only think for a brief moment as you are startled by the sound of somone coming,you quickly transform yourself to mach your surroundings as you become

15223222211.content:
your here what sounds like an older girl,possibly a teenager or very young adult....and you quickly change into a pull up waiting to be bought..you feel a tingly aura come over you as your form stretches and bends you are then covered over with a clear packaging..you feel it fill with soft pullups,as you then become the pullup in the front....looking through the clear thin wrapping.

you think a bit,as you cant move. and would rather have a bit more freedom of movement. you concentration and move your "consciousness" to the center and front of the pull up,and picture the cutest character you can think of ...as you become the image of an adorable G3 My Little Pony Character

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/myli...

you take a moment and look over your self,adjusting to your new "anthro" form...realizing you can move along the surface of the Diaper,despite being a 2d image..the feeling is surreal,you feel a warm and fuzzy feeling and cant help but let out a giggle as a childlike girly voice escapes you..."just one more thing" you say as you imagine a cute little pink pullup of your own appearing on you with your cutie mark on the front...you soon see the teenage girl looking through the shelves,and you soon notice the Little Boy,looking about the age of 4 whose hand she is holding,possibly her little brother maybe?you wondered if they would pay you any mind,despite your girly appearance,though you remained a Gender neutral Pullup..you think of how cute that little boy would look with a My little pony pullup snug around his waste.

does she grab you for her brother?

info.brief_description: You gain the ability to transform into Inanimate Objects, willing transformation (Rewards)
info.description:
Honestly, I'll give a shit-ton of GP if anyone adds. I'm really lacking good transformation material and was wondering if someone would add.

I've seen many stories where the character is either forced into transformations and he hates them, or transforms into something but can't turn back. WELL, NO MORE!

In this story, you play as a random person living alone. One day, he gets a dream telling him he has the ability to transform without limit, and to fulfill his fantasies, and fulfill them he will!

RULES

1: Anything is allowed. M/M, Animals, Shemales, GO WILD!
2: No Deaths please, this story is about enjoying yourself, not fearing for your life.
3: As an addition to 2, NO PAIN! This is a story about fulfilling fetishes.
4: Use proper grammar and spelling. I will either edit or delete bad additions. Autocorrect exists for a reason, use it!
5: I'll allow "Other" Chapters, but only to a certain extent. I will end a line of "Other" chapters if I feel like it's starting to get excessive
6: I will reward good chapters.
7: UNAWARE STORY, THE USER OF YOU SHOULD ALWAYS BE UNAWARE YOU'RE A PERSON
8: Reread the rules every time you add a new chapter, you never know when this could be updated


You’ll be rewarded so long as your chapter isn’t a choice chapter or one-liner. Rewards vary depending on how much I like the chapter, so put your heart into it!

NEW RULE. YOU CAN ONLY TRANSFORM INTO OBJECTS OR ANIMALS.
NEW RULE #2. YOU CAN TELL PEOPLE ABOUT YOUR POWERS AND TRANSFORM FOR THEM, BUT THEY MUST ALWAYS BE KIND TOWARDS YOU

This story is sort of a sister story to https://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/2188228-Shrink-as-you-want , a story with the same premise of enjoying yourself yet instead of transforming you're shrinking
